name: PWA Demo - Progressive Web App 演示
description: 一个完整的PWA演示应用，展示Progressive Web App的核心功能和特性

icons.src: data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 192 192'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:%232196F3;stop-opacity:1' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:%231976D2;stop-opacity:1' /></linearGradient></defs><rect width='192' height='192' rx='20' fill='url(%23grad1)'/><text x='96' y='120' text-anchor='middle' fill='white' font-size='60' font-family='Arial, sans-serif' font-weight='bold'>PWA</text><circle cx='96' cy='60' r='8' fill='white' opacity='0.8'/><circle cx='120' cy='45' r='6' fill='white' opacity='0.6'/><circle cx='72' cy='45' r='6' fill='white' opacity='0.6'/></svg>

screenshots.src: data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 540 720'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:%23667eea;stop-opacity:1' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:%23764ba2;stop-opacity:1' /></linearGradient></defs><rect width='540' height='720' fill='url(%23bgGrad)'/><rect x='20' y='100' width='500' height='520' rx='12' fill='white'/><text x='270' y='60' text-anchor='middle' fill='white' font-size='32' font-weight='bold'>PWA Demo</text><text x='270' y='90' text-anchor='middle' fill='white' font-size='18' opacity='0.9'>Progressive Web App 演示</text><text x='270' y='180' text-anchor='middle' fill='%23333' font-size='24' font-weight='bold'>什么是 PWA？</text><text x='50' y='220' fill='%23666' font-size='14'>Progressive Web App 是一种结合了网页和原生应用优势的技术</text><rect x='50' y='250' width='440' height='60' rx='8' fill='%23f5f5f5'/><text x='70' y='275' fill='%232196F3' font-size='16' font-weight='bold'>📱 可安装性</text><text x='70' y='295' fill='%23666' font-size='12'>用户可以将PWA安装到设备主屏幕</text><rect x='50' y='320' width='440' height='60' rx='8' fill='%23f5f5f5'/><text x='70' y='345' fill='%232196F3' font-size='16' font-weight='bold'>🔄 离线工作</text><text x='70' y='365' fill='%23666' font-size='12'>通过Service Worker缓存资源，离线也能使用</text><rect x='50' y='390' width='440' height='60' rx='8' fill='%23f5f5f5'/><text x='70' y='415' fill='%232196F3' font-size='16' font-weight='bold'>🔔 推送通知</text><text x='70' y='435' fill='%23666' font-size='12'>支持后台推送通知，提升用户参与度</text></svg>

data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1024 768'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGrad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:%23667eea;stop-opacity:1' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:%23764ba2;stop-opacity:1' /></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1024' height='768' fill='url(%23bgGrad2)'/><rect x='50' y='80' width='924' height='608' rx='12' fill='white'/><text x='512' y='50' text-anchor='middle' fill='white' font-size='36' font-weight='bold'>PWA Demo - Desktop View</text><text x='512' y='140' text-anchor='middle' fill='%23333' font-size='28' font-weight='bold'>PWA 功能演示</text><rect x='100' y='180' width='400' height='200' rx='8' fill='%23f5f5f5'/><text x='120' y='210' fill='%232196F3' font-size='18' font-weight='bold'>Service Worker 控制</text><rect x='120' y='230' width='120' height='35' rx='4' fill='%232196F3'/><text x='180' y='250' text-anchor='middle' fill='white' font-size='12'>注册 SW</text><rect x='250' y='230' width='120' height='35' rx='4' fill='%232196F3'/><text x='310' y='250' text-anchor='middle' fill='white' font-size='12'>注销 SW</text><rect x='120' y='280' width='120' height='35' rx='4' fill='%232196F3'/><text x='180' y='300' text-anchor='middle' fill='white' font-size='12'>更新缓存</text><rect x='524' y='180' width='400' height='200' rx='8' fill='%23f5f5f5'/><text x='544' y='210' fill='%232196F3' font-size='18' font-weight='bold'>通知功能</text><rect x='544' y='230' width='140' height='35' rx='4' fill='%232196F3'/><text x='614' y='250' text-anchor='middle' fill='white' font-size='12'>请求通知权限</text><rect x='694' y='230' width='140' height='35' rx='4' fill='%23ccc'/><text x='764' y='250' text-anchor='middle' fill='white' font-size='12'>发送测试通知</text></svg>
